content: 3/21/20 reposted for test knits to identify/fix problem with border count **please note that i am a full-time graduate student and am unfortunately not able to help knitters with this pattern ** jints /people/jints suggested this might be the solution border solution for odd stitch i have completed this blanket several times and i corrected the stitch count problem in border by transfering the odd extra stitch to be part of corner so you will work 2 stitches in corner instead of one i e r1 kfb p116 sts kfb pm p2 in corner repeat r2 eyelet row yo k2tog until marker yo k2 in corner repeat for spindle cables r5 yo p2 k2 30 times p2 yo k2 repeat continue like this making changes as you come to them so stitches one side of corner mirror those on other side of corner much appreciation also to mrmobo /people/mrmobo also took the time to propose a solution here https //www ravelry com/projects/mrmobo/sleeping-beauty-baby-blanket
